input_text:
Job Title: Sr. XDR Consultant

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Consulting, Information Technology, Sales

Description:
Piper Companies is seeking a Fully Remote Principal XDR Consultant to join us supporting the worlds largest network Security Company in the world. The Principal XDR Consultant will provide rapid response performing design, deployment, and configuration relating to Palo Alto Networks solutions. As the technical expert during a customer incident, this role will focus on implementing Palo Alto XDR and/or providing configurating enhancements.

﻿

Responsibilities of the Principal XDR Consultant include:

Deploy and configure XDR across customer environments, including endpoints and cloud environmentsTune and optimize endpoint agents to maximize security effectiveness while minimizing operational impactAssist in building policies based on machine learning and behavioral analyticsAnalyze logs and events generated by XDR to identify, investigate, and mitigate security incidentsInteract with the Palo Alto Networks Unit 42 to analyze and remediate cybersecurity events (Remediation limited to Firewall Implementation/Configuration/Hardening)Interact with Palo Alto Networks Unit 42 and customer to develop recommendations and roadmaps for enhancing the effectiveness of customer’s cybersecurity controlsAbility to communicate and lead effectively in a crisis situation with all levels of a customer’s organization from Engineering/Operations to C Level staffMaintain knowledge of current cybersecurity threats and industry trends

Qualifications for the Principal XDR Consultant include: 

5+ years in a technical consulting or engineering role3 years experience deploying and managing XDR platforms, including expertise in endpoint agent deployment and configurationStrong understanding of endpoint security technologies, such as software firewalls, antivirus, anti-malware, and endpoint protection platformsKnowledge of machine learning and behavioral analytics principles, enabling the development and tuning of effective security policiesAbility to analyze logs and events generated by XDR to detect and respond to security incidents

Compensation for the Principal XDR Consultant include:

Salary: $140,000 - $150,000 Fully RemoteFull benefits: Healthcare, Dental, Vision, 401k, Flexible work schedule

Keywords:

Prisma Access, SME, Security Subject Matter Expert, Security Solution Implementation, Next-Gen Firewall, Security Operating Platform, Security Environment, Network Security Solutions, Panorama, Log Collectors, NGFW, Global Protect, Palo Alto Networks, Network Security, Cybersecurity Solutions, BGP, SD-WAN, VXLAN, Routing and Switching, High-End Firewall Appliances, CISSP, CCNA, CNSE, JNCIE-SEC, WAN Technologies, LAN Technologies, Internet Protocols, Application and Threat Signatures, Technical Support, Remote Support, Customer Communication, Security Roadmap, Production Cutover, Technical Guidance, Code Upgrades, Security Integration, Security Consultant, Technical Security Support, Network and Security Teams, Business Confidence, Senior Security Leadership, Security Certifications, Technical Certifications, Global Protect, SASE, XDR, Detection and response, automation.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
